akn:section.akn:heading: Grand Canyon Game Preserve included in park

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 687. Grand Canyon Game Preserve included in park Such parts of the Grand Canyon National Game Preserve, designated under authority of section 684 of this title, as are by this Act included with 11 So in original. Probably should be “within”. the Grand Canyon National Park are excluded and eliminated from said game preserve. (Feb. 26, 1919, ch. 44, § 9, 40 Stat. 1178.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThis Act, referred to in text, is act Feb. 26, 1919, ch. 44, 40 Stat. 1175, which is classified principally to subchapter XXIV (§ 221 et seq.) of chapter 1 of this title. For complete classification of this Act to the Code, see Tables.
